hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Jabir that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:If one of you comes (back from a journey) at night. he should not enter his house as a night visitor (but should wait) until a woman whose husband has been away from house has removed the hair from her private parts and a woman with dishevelled hair has combed her hair

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ الطُّرُوقِ وَهُوَ الدُّخُولُ لَيْلاً لِمَنْ وَرَدَ مِنْ سَفَرٍ
chapter.eng-name: It is disliked to enter at night when coming home from a journey
